title: Leaked Video From This Tragedy Will Turn Your Stomach (Ep 1807)
description:
In this episode, I address the horrifying video emerging out of Uvalde. Also, I address the latest inflation number release and what it means for you. 

News Picks:

Comeback kid: Trump wins with whites, Hispanics, says Dick Morris.

Inflation jumps to 9.1%, highest in four decades.


Law Professor Accuses Senator Hawley of "Transphobic" Questions, But Has Her Own Problems With Language.

California is attacking the Second Amendment again. 

Liberals are trying to insulate themselves from election reviews. 


Biden must address the spyware problem. 

Liberal Media: The Nonwhite White Supremacists Are Coming.

Liberal Billionaire Bill Gates Urges Governments to Invest In Orwellian Digital ‘Payment and ID Systems.’

‘Pedo Pete’: Massive 4Chan Hack Of Hunter Biden’s Explicit Texts, Images, Videos Rocks The Internet.

The richest counties in the United States.
